# QualtRics

The [QualtRics pakcage](https://docs.ropensci.org/qualtRics/) is a key r package I utilize. The package provides an API access from Qualtrics to a R environment. If you manage separate Qualtrics accounts, set your credentials to project environmental settings. See below

```{r eval= FALSE}

 usethis::edit_r_environ("project")

```
